alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 1:34PM MST until December 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Grand Valley, Debeque to Silt Corridor, Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin and Upper Gunnison River Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Upper Gunnison River Valley
